methods.name: OsrHelper
methods.logic: Constructor for the OsrHelper class. Initializes the parameter_count_ and stack_slot_count_ members based on the provided OptimizedCompilationInfo.  Calculates the number of stack slots needed based on the register count in the bytecode array.

methods.name: SetupFrame
methods.logic: Sets up the optimized frame by reserving spill slots to accommodate the unoptimized frame's state. This is necessary for On-Stack Replacement (OSR) to seamlessly transition from unoptimized to optimized code.
